  • First-person Perspective: Experience a night of horror from a first-person perspective.
  • Multiple Scenes: Explore maps based on the style of modern apartment buildings (5 in total).
  • Psychological Horror: Immerse yourself in terrifying encounters within an eerie story.
  • Puzzle-solving: Solve puzzles in complex environments using document clues.
  • Choice Inclination: Alter the course of the plot through dialogues.
  • Horror Scene Warning Feature: Don't like sudden horror scenes? No problem, with this feature enabled, you'll receive warnings in advance!
  • Save Feature: Automatic chapter-based saving feature.

about


This work is part of the 24H Stories series. Please refer to the information on the right for other works in the series.

For youtuber and livestreamer


You are welcome to share any videos or pictures on your video platform. Feel free to express your opinions, whether positive or negative. I would greatly appreciate it if you could feature my game in your creations. If you would like me to include your related content (name, avatar, link) on the creator recommendation page of the next game, please submit your request in the discussion forum. Thank you :)

item.title: Strange world
item.description:
About This Game

This is a game of drawing lines and receiving water.
The small water cup in the game feels particularly sad because there is no water in the cup. Let's help it successfully receive water together. In the game, we need to draw lines to guide water into the water cup to pass the level. Drawing lines requires ink, and the less used, the higher the star rating.
Note that you can use fixed objects around you to maintain the position of the line segment.
The entire game has almost only two shades of blue and white, and the characters and scenes are also outlined with extremely simple lines.
Simplicity exudes a sense of mystery and looks unique. With beautiful graphics, elegant music design, and simple yet compact operation, the game can bring players a very relaxed gaming experience. Now let's challenge together!

item.title: Ink: Tournament Paintball
item.description:
About This Game

START YOUR PAINTBALL TOURNAMENT
Set up your tournament rules, invite your friends and dominate the field. Ink: Tournament Paintball® is a FPS/PVP online that provides you the opportunity to play against the world or in a private environment versus bots. You can join and find rivals on our constantly growing community on Discord.



COMPETITIVE EVENTS
Are you ready to lead your team to victory?
You can play on the Competitive League a 5v5 Elimination Mode and work hard to rank up.
This intense paintball experience is perfect for players who love a challenge and thrive under pressure.



FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE GUNS
Get the best paintball guns, more than +50 variations and a lot of attachments are ready on the in-game store to have a new owner.
You can attach every accesory on the Workbench Menu, each one will modify the visual aspect and of course the performance of the marker. And not only your guns, you can also change the entire outfit of your character.


You can read specs of each item on store description.

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF EVERY MOMENT
You can use the waiting room to work on the last details of the strategies to follow with your team, reviewing the layout together.



REALISTIC AS F*
Play now on Windy City Major, IL. Atlantic City, NJ. or the final step on Kissimmee, FL. Start your trip around the World Cup of Paintball 2022-2023 today on Ink: Tournament Paintball®!

item.title: Falling Down
item.description:
About This Game


Gameplay
-Falling Down is an action-adventure game and an epic interactive experience
-Experience animated film quality storytelling
-Show your puzzle and parkour skills
-Explore different dimensions

2023 FREE CONTENT ROADMAP


Story
Falling Down tells the story of a hero who struggles against the king who oppresses his people. Can you protect your people ?

item.title: Arrival of Beasts
item.description:
About This Game


Tower Defense mixed with RTS- and MOBA-elements. Move your player around the map to build up your placed blueprints of towers and buildings. Cast different spells within your range, collect objects, repair your towers, build mopdules and try to play strategically.


Prepare yourself for the next map at the headquarter by equipping your base and unlocking strong abilities. Study maps in detail and plan your next strategy. Take a look at the beastcards, your statistics and compare yourself with other players in the online ranking. Create a team with up to 8 players and help each other reaching further progress with boosts.


Build more than 9 different towers to implement your individual tactics. Some towers allow you to use modules to create unique effects. Other towers have military abilities by default to support your plan. Each standard tower can be upgraded from level 1 to level 8 to kill the strongest beasts.


Craft 8 different basic modules and use them to improve your towers. In the late game, modules can be combined to stronger modules in order to create enormous effects. By leveling the modules you can defeat the hardest beasts.


More than 45 unlockable skills await you in the skillstar. You can unlock more buildings, spells for your player or more special talents. The basic modules can also be reinforced there.


Each achieved profile level allows you to invest talentpoints in Military, Economy or Science. This allows you to specialize and improve your individual playing style.


The campaign consists of 6 worlds and 30 maps and can be repeated infinite times after playing through. This process is called prestige and rewards you enormously. In addition, the game difficulty changes dynamically after each prestige, so new strategies are required.


Discover more than 42 beasts and 33 bossbeasts. Each beast is unique and can be equipped with special skills later in the game that make life difficult for the player. There are also ranged beasts that can destroy your towers. A tactical placement is therefore very important.


Collect Resources (Gold, Rubonium and Amnestryth) to buy buildings, modules or upgrades during a match. If you win, resources are converted into valuable skillpoints.


Build lots of different buildings from the three pathes military, economy and science. These include mines, towers, power-up buildings, module factories, ... and more!


Be the best! Collect prestige-points and climb up the ranking to show everyone you´re the best. Create a team of up to eight players and work together to get #1 in the ranking. You can help and strengthen each other with team donations.


Buy random generated objects with random generated properties and four different rarities. Equip your base with up to 8 objects suitable for YOUR strategy.


Prove yourself on the endless map. Which wave can you reach? Compare yourself to other players on the endless map ranking. No matter how far you get, the endless map remains dynamically exciting because of an interesting spawning system.


Choose the appropriate difficulty, collect 100 achievements, collect and study beastcards, learn interesting mechanics and use them cleverly, prestige-ranks unlock new content, buy >24 different random generated prestige-items if you reach prestige-rank 2, your profile statistics will depicted legendary in the trophyroom, play random maps with new situations, levelsystem for profile/beasts/abilities, play together with your friends in realtime, ...

item.title: Zombie Killing Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Kill zombies in dozens of different game modes! It can even be in space or roman colosseum. Or design your own levels in the game editor! The only important thing in this game, killing zombies is very satisfying!

Gameplay

Zombie Killing Simulator is a action/simulation game. This game has a different gameplay for each game mode.

Game Modes

  • Waves
  • Tower Defense
  • Top Down Shooter
  • Free Mode
  • Zombie Hunt
  • Chaos Mode
  • Funny Minigames

Features

  • Different weapons, gameplays, models, goals and maps for each level.
  • Level Editor (Save your level and share with Steam Community!)
  • Lifetime new game mode updates
  • Highly optimized and detailed gameplay
  • In-game self-improvement system
  • Steam achievements
  • Customization settings
  • Impressive Graphics and Physics

item.title: Seven Little Spider Kittens
item.description:
About This Game

Prepare to be whisked away on a mesmerizing journey into the immersive realm of... Seven Little Spider Kittens? Sure, why not!
A fairly alright VR platformer action shooter that introduces the Spiderkittens, and Spidermom! for the first time in the history of mankind, blending feline agility(possibly also rockets) with arachnid prowess in an unprecedented gaming experience.

Seven Little Spider Kittens' isn't just a game—it's an unforgettable adventure that pushes your nausea tolerance to the limit! (This may or may not be true)

It's a lovely day to lose your children, so go find your seven little spider kittens and bring them home in this relaxing hybrid VR platformer/shooter/eater

item.title: SKD
item.description:
About This Game

Live the adventure of a band of teens around the lively Skyark city! (Fully Voiced)
You're gonna get your ass kicked for sure kid, but there'll be plenty of help along the way:
  • CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER
    (3 starters: dragon Warrior / libromancy Mage / Fast shapeshifter)
  • Level up your unique SKILL TREE and attributes build (retrain to adapt anytime)
  • Drop and EQUIPMENT loot and (funny) materials to upgrade it
  • Make up your favorite team of ASSISTS (Marvel vs Capcom style)
  • IDENTIFY any enemy to learn more about them (Metroid Prime scanner)

(made by one guy, features various music composers)
..the game has also been described as "funny" by some people, however I strongly disagree

item.title: Electoral Dynasty
item.description:
About This Game

Become the Prime Minister of one of many nations, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. You must keep your job by balancing the agenda of the various parties forming your coalition while also ensuring that your country stays healthy through various decisions. Will you pursue free market capitalism, install a planned economy with workers at the forefront, or strike a balance between the two? Will you form a brutal police state or pursue individual freedoms for all your citizens? The choice is yours...

By approving or vetoing Bills and Executive Orders from all sects of the political spectrum, you must ensure that values intrinsic to national health, such as the strength of the military and the quality of education, maintain balanced. You also need to make sure that you're doing enough to make the people want to keep your party in power.

Features:
- Over 200 Bills, Executive Orders, and Events, making each play through experience distinct
- 7 political parties to choose from, falling on all points of the political spectrum
- 4 nations with distinct advantages and disadvantages

item.title: Deep Blue Odyssey
item.description:
About This Game

Deep Blue Odyssey is a thrilling submarine running game that will test your reflexes and challenge your strategic thinking. As the captain of a state-of-the-art submersible vessel, you will need to navigate through treacherous waters, avoiding torpedoes and sea mines, while making sure you keep your vessel afloat. With simple one-touch controls, you can either ascend or descend in the water, but you must be careful not to drop too low or rise too high, or risk colliding with obstacles.

As you progress through the game, you will encounter various challenges, such as navigating through narrow channels, avoiding underwater obstacles, and outmaneuvering enemy submarines.

Deep Blue Odyssey features stunning graphics and realistic sound effects that immerse you in the underwater world. With multiple levels of difficulty, you can challenge yourself to beat your previous high scores and unlock new achievements. So dive into the deep blue sea and embark on an unforgettable adventure in Deep Blue Odyssey!

item.title: Steel Thunder
item.description:
About This Game

Steel Thunder is an action-packed runner where you play as a knight and race through a castle while jumping and dodging obstacles to collect coins. The game is an exciting adventure that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking to conquer each level.

As a knight, you must jump over walls with agility and agility, avoiding deadly traps

The game's stunning graphics and fast-paced gameplay make Steel Thunder an unforgettable experience. Difficulty increases as time progresses, providing a challenge to keep you on your toes.

Get ready to jump, dodge and collect coins in Steel Thunder, the ultimate runner that will keep you entertained for hours.

item.title: Chain Ninja
item.description:
About This Game

Chain Ninja is an exciting action-adventure game designed and developed by an experienced game development team. In the game, players need to play a chain ninja, traverse the entire room by hanging ropes in the air, obtain keys, and avoid various obstacles and traps in the level.

Chain Ninja's gameplay is very simple, yet challenging. At the beginning of the game, the player will be placed in a room. Players need to use ropes to hang in the air and move their positions by swinging the ropes. As the game progresses, the difficulty of the level gradually increases. Players need faster reactions and more precise controls to avoid various obstacles and traps. For example, in some levels, players need to pay attention to the time and the opening of organs, or use ropes to fix themselves on the wall to avoid traps on the ground.

In addition to avoiding obstacles and traps, players also need to find clues in the level.

The operation of the game is very simple and intuitive. Players only need to use the virtual buttons or gestures on the screen to control the movement and climbing of the character. The game has beautiful graphics and realistic sound effects, creating a real gaming experience.

Chain Ninja is a very fun and challenging game for players of all ages. Come and challenge your limits and become a real chain ninja!

item.title: Eternal Roadster
item.description:
About This Game

Eternal Roadsteris an exciting and challenging game that will test your driving skills and reflexes. In this game, you'll be controlling a high-speed race car as it speeds down a never-ending road, constantly changing direction to avoid falling off and failing the game.

The game is easy to pick up, but difficult to master. To control your car, you simply need to swipe left or right on the screen to change lanes.

As you race down the road, you'll also collect gold coins that you can use to unlock new vehicles. Each car has its own unique stats, such as speed and handling, so you'll need to choose wisely to find the one that best fits your playstyle.

In addition to the main game mode, Eternal Roadster also offers a range of challenge modes that will put your driving skills to the test. These challenges range from time trials to obstacle courses, and will keep you coming back for more as you strive to beat your high scores.

item.title: Vertex Rush
item.description:
About This Game

Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping climbing adventure with Vertex Rush! In this addictive game, you'll need to guide your character up a tower while collecting diamonds along the way. But be warned - the blocks below disappear quickly, and one wrong move could send you plummeting to your doom!

To play, simply use the left and right arrow keys to climb up the tower. The faster you climb, the more points you'll earn - but be careful not to move too quickly and miss the diamonds. Each diamond you collect adds to your score

With its simple yet challenging gameplay, Vertex Rush is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good challenge. So what are you waiting for? Download Vertex Rush now and start your climb to the top!

Features:

Fast-paced climbing gameplay
Collect diamonds for extra points
Avoid disappearing blocks to stay alive
Simple controls make it easy to play, but difficult to master

item.title: Cowpocalypse
item.description:
About This Game

You have been sent to Earth to abduct cows for reasons beyond human comprehension. Abduct cows to increase your score but beware of angry farmers! They don't appreciate you taking their cattle...

item.title: Joker Show - Horror Escape
item.description:
About This Game

Joker Show - Horror Escape - 3D FPS Hide&Seek Game

Your parents left for the night, and you stayed at home alone, you were bored and you decided to call the Jester (Joker), but something went wrong...
It looks like you succeeded, now the jester wants to play with you, hide and don't let him catch you, find a way to call the jester away.

Description of the gameplay:
You play as a teenager who is left alone at home and decides to try summoning spirits.
Your task is to first find the necessary items for the ceremony, and follow the instructions to call the jester (joker).
When you call the jester, he will trap you and lock you in the basement, try to find a way out and escape before the clock strikes 12, because at 12 o'clock at night, the jester will start a show where you will be the main participant!
You have 5 hours to escape, or find a way to get rid of the jester, hide, run away, solve puzzles to find a way to escape.


Features:
  • Atmospheric graphics
  • Interesting puzzles
  • Excellent optimization

item.title: Obby
item.description:
About This Game

Run, jump, puzzle. The tasks you have to master in Obby with Kitty.

Obby is a combination of obstacle and jumping puzzle. The goal is to find the right path and, above all, to master it. Kitty has to make it through different levels. Sometimes you are above the clouds, sometimes in a dark dungeon or trying to cross a lake.
Jumping from stone to stone may sound easy, but if these stones move or are barely bigger than you, the whole thing becomes much more difficult.
If one or two puzzles are added or precise timing is required, the level of difficulty increases enormously.
At the beginning it might be enough for you to reach the end of a level with a lot of targeted jumps and some timing, if necessary with a little help.
But if you want to collect all the stars or even be among the first in the leaderboard, every jump has to be perfect and your timing must always be right.
It sounds difficult, and it is. But who doesn't love a challenge?

- Master tricky jumps
- Balance over narrow bridges
- Avoid nasty traps
- Solve puzzles
- Find the right timing

- 21 story levels
- 15 story levels in particularly difficult mode including a leaderboard
- 2 extra levels with 2 special modes
- Play as Kitty or one of her friends (friends only available outside of the story)

item.title: Pizza Delivery [zebaxx]
item.description:
About This Game

Pizza Delivery is a short indie psychological horror game about a fictional story.

This is the second game in the video game saga [zebaxx]

"Pizza Delivery"

You are a young Spanish woman who has just moved to the outskirts of Venice, and has just found a job in a newly opened pizzeria...

Game features

Old VHS movie aesthetic.

Dialogues with other NPCs.

Gameplay

"Pizza Delivery" is a walking simulator with dialogues between the character and npc.

item.title: Astrominer
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a thrilling space odyssey in AstroMiner! Take control of a brave robot, stranded in an asteroid belt after a crash landing. Your mission: build a base to find your way back home. Craft items, overcome enemies, and establish communication with Earth. Explore the wonders of the asteroid belt, uncover secrets, and construct a space ship to return. Prepare for an out-of-this-world adventure filled with challenges, discovery, and triumph. AstroMiner awaits, offering an immersive journey where your ingenuity and determination will pave the path back to Earth.



Asteroid belts are built with procedural generation to create a new world each time you play! Multiple biome types provide their own advantages.. from Lava, to Gold, to Stone - you'll need to explore the asteroid belt to get the materials needed to get home.



Craft different types of structures to help get you home. Chests and Forge open up different crafting options.



Turrets, Doors, Elevators, Pipes, and Buckets, are just some of the things available for you to make!



You're not restricted to your robot in AstroMiner. Get out and explore on foot, build tunnels that only you can fit through, and fly buildings to move them around!



Once you have enough materials, it's time to go home. Complete all the minigames to deploy Antennas, establish communications with Earth, align your rocket, and fly home!

item.title: Mad Jyacer
item.description:
About This Game

The game is a third-person action game. The family decided to go on a diet and bought a juicer.
You control the fruit and try to get to the juicer. You will be hindered by Various junk food.

Features:
1) Three companies - one per character.
2)Three modes for a record with one life.
3) Procedurally generated levels.
4)Music selection in the level.
